Description:
Following the forest in an easterly direction we arrive at a small camp.

There we find the group of thieves who have stolen the gem from Lord Hanshek. One of them, the youngest, sees us and approaches us saying:

(Thief) "Wolves... I don't know what you want from us but this is our camp and we are not willing to abandon it.
DescriptionAction: Say what you have come for and leave."
